Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a pair of cookie sheets.
Roll each ball in the remaining confectioners' sugar and place on the prepared cookie sheets, spacing them about 2 inches apart.
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly golden, about 12 to 15 minutes. Let cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a baking sheet.
